head.title: Metro Briefing | New York: Brooklyn: Woman Wounded In Shooting

hedline.hl1: Metro Briefing | New York: Brooklyn: Woman Wounded In Shooting

body.head.byline: By Patrick Healy (NYT); Compiled by John Harney

abstract.p: Chance Kemar is charged with criminal possession of gun after accidently shooting his pregnant girlfriend in leg in Brooklyn (S)

block.p: A 19-year-old Brooklyn man shot his pregnant girlfriend in the leg yesterday in Brooklyn, the police said. The girlfriend, Ebony Oden, 21, had been visiting the man, Chance Kemar, at his apartment at 1487 Nostrand Avenue in Flatbush when Mr. Kemar accidentally fired a Mac-10 machine pistol and grazed her leg, the police said. Ms. Oden was treated at Brookdale University Hospital and Medical Center and released. Mr. Kemar was charged with criminal possession of a weapon, the police said. He has no previous criminal record.
